message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about astronomy and the solar system. Planets orbit around a star, specifically our Sun. Option (A) is incorrect because planets do not orbit volcanos. Option (B) is incorrect because while planets may reflect starlight, they do not orbit it. Option (D) is incorrect because people are not the center of the universe and planets do not orbit around them. Option (C) is the correct answer as it refers to the concept of astral beings or celestial bodies such as stars.
